THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON
11.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Crl.MC.No.2660 OF 2014 2 202 KER/TS21
ORDER
It is fairly submitted by the learned counsel
for the petitioner that the matter has become
infructuous. The accused was acquitted. The same
is recorded. The Crl.M.C. is dismissed as
infructuous.
Sd/-
P. SOMARAJAN
JUDGE
